channel.title: Projects on Silja George
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Silja George

item.title: Project 1: Supervised learning using Iris dataset
item.description: Read the dataset to the python environment Done pre processing the dataset Outliers were handled Performed three classifications over the dataset. It includes the logistic regression, random forest and SVM. An instance of classification of iris dataset link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: Pre-processing of a dataset (Titanic dataset)
item.description: Loaded the dataset into python environment Fixed the index column Displayed the basic details presented in the dataset Missing values are handled by appending mean as the default value Outliers were checked and handled Min-Max scaling normalization were performed for model fitting Representation of outliers on the Titanic dataset link to GitHub Repository
